thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 5 of 108
thread.title: Abhishek Tejpaul

author: Abhishek Tejpaul
title: Abhishek Tejpaul
text:
I have used couple of cashback websites but I can say topcashback definitely is the best one out there. I used to use shopathome.com before as they used to have 110% guarantee. But after they stopped that, I switched to topcashback.
I had an incident with topcashback when my $4500 transaction which was tickets to cruise (subject to 20% cashback) was not recorded somehow. I reported an issue and topcashback resolved the ticket and I got $900 cashback. So, I am happy with topcashback
